products_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection, fabrication, testing of MS black steel pipe Heavy grade of thickness 5.4mm conforming to IS : 1239 Part -1 including all fittings viz. Elbows, tees, flanges, etc. reduces clamps, MS support dash fasteners etc. including painting the pipe with two coats of approved primer and two coats of approved paint. Pipe joints shall be of groove with grooved coupling. All escavation, pedestal support, structural support shall be of vendor's scope. a. 100 mm NB
